welcome_message_body: Welcome to Chestnut Ridge, a charming city known for its beautiful parks and vibrant community. We are delighted to have you here and invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport handles all commercial flights and houses the airport's amenities and services.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the designated network.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights and is home to several major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights and is currently undergoing renovations to improve passenger experience.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights and is home to several major airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network for up to 30 minutes per session.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest and most modern terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
